items.question: How often do you really not succeed in completing your work?

Does your work require a lot of attention from you?

Do you have to come up with solutions by yourself to do certain tasks in your work?
Can you take leave when you want to?
Can you decide for yourself how to plan your working hours?

At work, there's an open atmosphere where problems can easily be discussed.
At work, signs of workload and overload are picked up well by managers
